content: in each double_crochet of the first group then 4 single_crochet in the 4ch-space again an slip_stitch in each double_crochet of the second group and again 4 single_crochet in the 4ch-space this operation will decrease the number of groups by 2 we will make such a decrease in every odd row repeat 3 double_crochet 2 chain single_crochet in the 4ch-space 2 chain 29 times end with 3 double_crochet you now have 30 groups of 3 double_crochet row 16 turn make 3 chain double_crochet double_crochet repeat 4 chain 3 double_crochet 29 times you have 30 groups of 3 double_crochet row 17 turn decrease 2 groups repeat double_crochet 2 double_crochet in one stitch double_crochet 2 chain single_crochet in the 4ch-space 2 chain 27 times end with double_crochet 2 double_crochet in one stitch double_crochet you have 28 groups of 4 double_crochet row 18 turn make 3 chain 3 double_crochet repeat 4 chain 4 double_crochet 27 times you have 28 groups of 4 double_crochet row 19 turn decrease 2 groups repeat 4 double_crochet 2 chain single_crochet in the 4ch-space 2 chain 25 times end with 4 double_crochet you have 26 groups of 4 double_crochet row 20 turn make 3 chain double_crochet double_crochet 2 double_crochet in one stitch double_crochet repeat 4 chain double_crochet double_crochet 2 double_crochet in one stitch double_crochet 25 times you have 26 groups of 5 double_crochet row 21 turn decrease 2 groups repeat 5 double_crochet 2 chain single_crochet in the 4ch-space 2 chain 23 times end with 5 double_crochet you have 24 groups of 5 double_crochet row 22 turn make 3 chain 4 double_crochet repeat 4 chain 5 double_crochet 23 times you have 24 groups of 5 double_crochet magic carpet studio www facebook com/magiccarpetstudio/ www magiccarpetstudio blogspot com row 23 turn decrease 2 groups repeat double_crochet double_crochet 2 double_crochet in one stitch double_crochet double_crochet 2 chain single_crochet in the 4ch-space 2 chain 21 times end with double_crochet double_crochet 2 double_crochet in one stitch double_crochet double_crochet you have 22 groups of 6 double_crochet row 24 turn make 3 chain 5 double_crochet repeat 4 chain 6 double_crochet 21 times you have 22 groups of 6 double_crochet row 25 turn decrease 2 groups repeat 2 double_crochet 2 double_crochet in one stitch 3 double_crochet 2 chain single_crochet in the 4ch-space 2 chain 19 times end with 2 double_crochet 2 double_crochet in one stitch 3 double_crochet you have 20 groups of 7 double_crochet row 26 turn make 3 chain 6 double_crochet repeat 4 chain 7 double_crochet 19 times you have 20 groups of 7 double_crochet row 27 turn decrease 2 groups repeat 3 double_crochet 2 double_crochet in one stitch 3 double_crochet 2 chain single_crochet in the 4ch-space 2 chain 17 times end with 3 double_crochet 2 double_crochet in one stitch 3 double_crochet you have 18 groups of 8 double_crochet row 28 turn make 3 chain 7 double_crochet repeat 4 chain 8 double_crochet 17 times you have 18 groups of 8 double_crochet row 29 turn decrease 2 groups repeat 8 double_crochet 2 chain single_crochet in the 4ch-space 2 chain
